thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 5 of 457
thread.title: Dolores Korczakowski Yevich
thread.title_full: DriveTime reviewed by Dolores Korczakowski Yevich

author: Dolores Korczakowski Yevich
title: Dolores Korczakowski Yevich
text: This was the easiest yet thorough and informative car buying experience I ever had. Once approved on line and I went into the store it was smooth sailing along. I was surprised at the detail to showing me inside the car and checking the outside and all working parts. I never felt so confident about driving a new car before. Everything was explained in great detail in the paperwork. Helped me to get the insurance on the phone. I was in and out with a car in my possession in less than three hours.
